All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AchievedCommonGoalNetMessage
Represents a client message indicating that a Common goal has been achieved.
AchievedPersonalGoalNetMessage
Represents a client message indicating that a personal goal has been achieved.
AdjacentTilesUpdatedNetMessage
Represents a client message indicating that the adjacent tiles have been updated.
AlreadyInGameException
An exception indicating that the user is already in a game and needs to leave it before creating or joining a new game.
AlreadyTakenNicknameException
An exception indicating that the nickname is already taken and not available.
AppClient
The main class for the client application.
AppServer
The main class for the server application.
AskAddress
The AskAddress class represents an input prompt for asking the user to insert a server address in order to create a connection to the server.
AskColumn
The AskColumn class represents an input prompt for asking the column number to insert chosen tiles into a bookshelf.
AskConfirm
The AskConfirm class represents an input prompt for confirming the start of a new game.
AskCoordinates
The AskCoordinates class represents an input prompt for asking the coordinates of tiles to be taken from the board.
AskCreateOrJoin
The AskCreateOrJoin class represents an input prompt for asking the user to choose between creating a new game, joining an existing game, or rejoining a game after a disconnection.
AskNickname
The AskNickname class represents the welcome page of the TUI and is an input prompt for asking the user to enter a unique nickname.
AskPlayersNumber
The AskPlayersNumber class represents an input prompt for choosing the number of players in the game when the player is creating a new game.
AskPort
The AskPort class represents an input prompt for entering a port in order to create a connection to the server.
AskProtocol
The AskProtocol class represents an input prompt for choosing a connection protocol between socket and RMI.
AskReceiver
The AskReceiver class represents an input prompt for asking the message receivers.
AskText
The AskText class represents an input prompt for asking the text of a message.
AskWait
The AskWait class represents an input prompt for waiting until the game begins (when there aren't enough players).
AskWaitTillConnectionUp
The AskWaitTillConnectionUp class represents an input prompt for waiting until the connection is up after a player's disconnection.
AssignedCommonGoalNetMessage
Represents a client message indicating that a new CommonGoal has been Assigned.
AssignedPersonalGoalNetMessage
Represents a client message indicating that a personal goal has been assigned to a player.
AsyncReader
The AsyncReader class implements the Runnable interface and is responsible for asynchronously reading input from a BufferedReader.
BackColorMyShelfieAttribute
A class representing the background color attribute.
BlockingPage
 
Board
Class used to represent the living room board for each game.
BoardRefilledNetMessage
Represents a client message indicating that the game board has been refilled.
BoardSquareType
Class used to represent the living room board square type in the board.
BoardUpdatedNetMessage
Class used to allow the client to be notified about the change of board.
BoardView
 
BoardViewController
 
BookShelf
Class used to represent bookshelf for each player.
BookshelfController
 
BookShelfUpdatedNetMessage
Represents message for the client indicating that the Bookshelf has changed.
BookshelfView
The `BookshelfView` class represents a graphical component that displays a bookshelf in a board game.
BookshelfViewType
The BookshelfViewType enum represents the different types of bookshelf views in the GUI.
ChangedCommonGoalAvailableScoreNetMessage
Represents message for the client indicating a change in the available score for common goals.
ChatManager
The ChatManager class handles the chat functionality in the game.
ChatMessage
ChatMessage is a class that represents a message sent from a player to another or to all players in the game.
ChatPage
 
ChatPage
Class that represents a chat page in the text-based user interface (TUI).
ChatPageController
 
ChatViewBox
Represents a custom component for displaying a chat box in the graphical user interface.
Client
The Client class represents a client in the game.
Client.Choice
Enumeration representing the client's connection choice (Socket or RMI).
ClientDispatcher
The `ClientDispatcher` class implements the `ClientDispatcherInterface` interface and is responsible for dispatching messages received from the server to the corresponding client.
ClientDispatcherInterface
The ClientDispatcherInterface interface defines the methods for dispatching server messages to the client.
ClientHeartBeater
The `ClientHeartBeater` class implements the `Runnable` interface and represents a thread that periodically sends a "nop" message to the server to maintain the connection with the client.
ClientInterface
Represents a "physical" user that wants to play the game.
ClientMessage
The ClientMessage interface represents a message sent from the client to the server.
ClientRmiAdapter
The `ClientRmiAdapter` class is an adapter that facilitates communication between the client and the server using the RMI (Remote Method Invocation) protocol.
ClientSocketImpl
The ClientSocketImpl class implements the ClientInterface and Runnable interfaces to provide a client-side socket implementation for network communication with the server.
ColorMyShelfieAttribute
An abstract class representing a colored attribute in MyShelfie.
CommonGoal
This class is used to define a generic standard structure for all common goal cards.
CommonGoalDeserializer
 
CommonGoalView
Represents a view for a common goal in the graphical user interface.
ConnectionBuilder
The ConnectionBuilder class is responsible for building connections between clients and servers using different protocols, such as sockets and RMI (Remote Method Invocation).
ConnectionPage
 
ConnectionPageController
 
Controller
The Controller class manages the game logic and interactions between the model and the view.
ControllerDispatcher
The ControllerDispatcher class handles the mapping between client interfaces and Controllers.
ControllerInterface
The ControllerInterface defines the methods that a game controller should implement.
Coordinate
Represent the row and column index for a tile item in the board or in the bookshelf
CreateGameNetMessage
Represents a server message for creating a game.
CurrentPlayerChangedListenerNetMessage
Represents message for the client indicating a change in the current player.
DragTilesToBookShelfNetMessage
Represents a server message for dragging tiles to the bookshelf.
EndGameTokenView
Represents the graphical view of an end game token.
EntryPatternGoal
This class was designed to represent a single TileType entry in a "pattern" for a PersonalGoal card.
ExceptionNetMessage
Represents a client message indicating an exception occurred during the game.
FirstPlayerSeatView
The FirstPlayerSeatView class represents a graphical component that displays the first player seat in a board game.
GameInterface
 
GameInterfaceController
 
GameManager
The abstract class representing the game manager responsible for managing the game flow and interactions.
GameState
Defines the game phase
GUI
The `GUI` class is responsible for managing the interaction between the client, user interface and server in the graphical user interface (GUI) version of the game.
GUILauncher
This class is used to launch and interact with the Graphical Interface of the Application
HelpPage
The HelpPage class represents a help page in the TUI user interface.
HomePage
The HomePage class represents the home page of the TUI.
HPointPane
The `HPointPane` class represents a horizontal point pane, a specialized type of `PointPane` with a single row.
InitGameManager
The game manager class responsible for initializing the game state and managing the initial game flow.
InitGameTimingState
The InitGameTimingState class represents the initial state in the timing state machine.
Input
The Input class represents an abstract input prompt in a text-based user interface.
InputCheck
 
InputSelector
The InputSelector class represents an input prompt that selects the Page to show based on the user's input.
JoinGameNetMessage
Represents a server message for joining a game.
JSONExclusionStrategy
A custom exclusion strategy for Gson serialization and deserialization.
JSONExclusionStrategy.ExcludedFromJSON
Create a specific annotation to exclude fields marked with this tag from JSON serialization and deserialization
LastPlayerUpdatedNetMessage
Represents a client message indicating an update on the last player.
LineCommonGoal
LineCommonGoal is a class that represents a generic CommonGoal which is satisfied if the BookShelf contains a given number of lines (rows or columns) each having a given number of different tile type.
LobbyController
This class is used to assign every user that wants to play MyShelfie game inside a different match.
LobbyControllerInterface
This interface defines the basic actions that a client can perform when tries to connect in a match game or create a new game.
LogicInterface
The LogicInterface interface defines the methods for the game logic and interaction.

LoginPageController

MainInterfaceController
 
MessageSentNetMessage
Represents a message to the client, notifying that a message was sent
Extends ClientMessage Interface
MessagesSentNetMessage
Represents the chat being sent.
MidGameManager
The MidGameManager class is responsible for managing the game flow during the mid-phase of the game.
MidGameTimingState
The MidGameTimingState class represents the mid-game state in the timing state machine.
MyShelfieAlertCreator
A utility class that is used to display some alert when an exception or an error occurs in the game
MyShelfieAnimation
Use to build an animation with "My Shelfie" style
MyShelfieAnimation.Builder
Static enclosing class to construct the chain of animations to apply at a node
MyShelfieAnimationCombineLogic
Defines all the possible combine logic for a chain of animation built with the MyShelfieAnimation class
MyShelfieAnsi
Provides a fluent API to generate ANSI escape sequences by specifying MyShelfieAttributes of your format.
MyShelfieAnsiFormat
Abstracts an Array of MyShelfieAttributes.
MyShelfieApplication
The GameEngine class represents the engine for a multiplayer game.
MyShelfieAttribute
Abstracts ANSI codes with intuitive names.
MyShelfieBloom
MyShelfieBloom effect is one of the decorations created for custom components of the graphical user interface.
MyShelfieButton
The MyShelfieButton class represents a customized button in the MyShelfie GUI.
MyShelfieChoiceBox
Customized ChoiceBox component with MyShelfie styling and decorations.
MyShelfieColor
A set of color designed for MyShelfie application
MyShelfieCommand
Abstracts ANSI codes with intuitive names.
MyShelfieComponent
Represents a customizable node
MyShelfieController
Represents each controller inside the My Shelfie application.
MyShelfieDarkShadow
Direct implementation of the MyShelfieShadow that creates a dark drop shadow for custom components

Represents a "MyShelfie decoration" applied to a custom graphical component according to the design of the game.

MyShelfieGlow effect is one of the decorations created for custom components of the graphical user interface.

The MyShelfieGraphicIcon class represents a graphical icon with "My Shelfie" style.

Represents an inner lighting decoration for a component in the graphical user interface.

MyShelfieLightShadow
Direct implementation of the MyShelfieShadow that creates a light drop shadow for custom components

The `MyShelfieMatrixComponent` class provides utility methods for working with tile subjects and their views in a graphical user interface (GUI).
MyShelfieObscured
MyShelfieObscured effect is one of the decorations created for custom components of the graphical user interface.
MyShelfieOpaque
MyShelfieObscured effect is one of the decorations created for custom components of the graphical user interface.
MyShelfiePathTransition
This class is used to create a smooth path transition from the element specified at its construction to the element(s) where it should be translated
MyShelfieRotateTransition
This class is used to create a smooth rotation transition from the center of the element on which the resulting animation will be applied
MyShelfieRoundEdge
MyShelfieRoundEdge effect is one of the decorations created for custom components of the graphical user interface.
MyShelfieRoundEdgeType
This class represent the default edge radius value that can be applied on different components to make their corner smooth
MyShelfieRustBorder
Represents a rust border decoration for a component in the graphical user interface.
MyShelfieScaleTransition
This class is used to create a smooth scale transition of the element on which the resulting animation will be applied
MyShelfieShadow
MyShelfieShadow effect is one of the decorations created for custom components of the graphical user interface.
MyShelfieShadowType
Define standard radius value of the shadow blur kernel
MyShelfieTransition
Common interface for all "My Shelfie" style transition that defines basic common operation
MyShelfieTransitionDurationType
The `MyShelfieTransitionDurationType` enum represents different types of transition durations for animations in the GUI toolkit.
MyShelfieTriangleButton
A custom triangular button component in the Shelfie GUI.
NoMoreTileSubjectsLeftInTheBag
Exception thrown when there are no more tile subjects left in the bag.
NopNetMessage
Represents a no-operation (NOP) message that can be sent between the client and the server.
NotEnoughSpaceInBookShelfException
Exception thrown when there is not enough space in the bookshelf to hold all elements.
NoTileTakenException
Exception thrown when no Tile object has been taken from the Board.
OnAchievedCommonGoalListener
A listener interface for notifying when a common goal is achieved.
OnAchievedPersonalGoalListener
A listener interface for notifying when a personal goal is achieved.
OnAdjacentTilesUpdatedListener
A listener interface for notifying when the adjacent tiles in the bookshelf are updated.
OnAssignedCommonGoalListener
A listener interface for notifying when a common goal is assigned at the start of the game.
OnAssignedPersonalGoalListener
A listener interface for notifying when a personal goal is assigned to a player.
OnBoardRefilledListener
A listener interface for notifying when the game board is refilled.
OnBoardUpdatedListener
A listener interface for notifying when the game board is updated.
OnBookShelfUpdatedListener
A listener interface for notifying when a player's bookshelf is updated.
OnChangedCommonGoalAvailableScoreListener
A listener interface for notifying when the available score for common goals changes.
OnClientConnectionLostListener
The OnClientConnectionLostListener interface defines a callback method for notifying when a client connection is lost.
OnCurrentPlayerChangedListener
A listener interface for notifying when the current player changes.
OnExceptionsListener
A listener interface for notifying when an exception occurs.
OnLastPlayerUpdatedListener
A listener interface for notifying when the last player is updated.
OnMessageSentListener
A listener interface for notifying when a message is sent.
OnPlayersListChangedListener
A listener interface for notifying when the list of players has changed, for example when a new player joins the game.
OnPlayerStateChangedListener
A listener interface for notifying when the state of a player has changed.
OnPointsUpdatedListener
A listener interface for notifying when the points of a player have been updated.
OnServerConnectionLostListener
Interface needed to menage in case the connection is lost
OnStateChangedListener
A listener interface for notifying when the game state has changed.
OnUpdateNeededListener
A listener interface for notifying when an update is needed for a player, for example after a disconnection.
OnWinnerChangedListener
A listener interface for notifying when the State.getWinner() winner of the game has changed.
OpponentBookshelfView
The `OpponentBookshelfView` class extends the `BookshelfView` class and represents a graphical component that displays an opponent's bookshelf in a board game.
OpponentsInterfaceController
 
OthersPage
The Others Page class represents a page that displays information about other players' bookshelves and points.
Page
The Page class represents an abstract base class for different pages in the TUI.
PersonalBookshelfController
 
PersonalBookshelfView
The PersonalBookshelfView class represents a graphical component that displays the personal bookshelf of a player in a board game.
PersonalGoal
This class represent the personal goal card referring to the official RuleBook .
PersonalGoalView
Represents a graphical component for displaying a personal goal.
Player
Player is a class that represent a player of the game.
PlayersListChangedNetMessage
Represents a client message indicating that the Player list has changed.
PlayerState
Enumeration that represents the connection state of a player.
PlayerStateChangedNetMessage
Represents a client message indicating that the player state has changed.
PointCell
The `PointCell` class represents a layout component used in a graphical user interface (GUI) to display a point cell.
PointPane
The `PointPane` class represents a grid pane used in a graphical user interface (GUI) to display a point pane.
PointPlayer
Class that represents the points achieved by a player.
PointPlayerBox
 
PointsUpdatedNetMessage
Represents a client message indicating that the scoring of a player has changed.
QuitGameNetMessage
Represents a server message for quitting a game.
RmiAccepter
The RmiAccepter class is responsible for accepting RMI client connections and registering them with the server.
RmiAccepterInterface
The RmiAccepterInterface defines the methods for accepting client connections via RMI.
RmiClientImpl
The RmiClientImpl class is the implementation of the RmiClientInterface interface.
RmiClientInterface
This interface defines the methods that can be invoked by clients through RMI.
RmiServerImpl
The `RmiServerImpl` class is an implementation of the `RmiServerInterface` interface.
RmiServerInterface
The RmiServerInterface interface defines the remote methods that can be invoked on an RMI server.
ScoringTokenView
The `ScoringTokenView` class represents a graphical view component for a scoring token.
SentMessageNetMessage
Represents a server message for sending a text message to specific receivers.
ServerDispatcher
The `ServerDispatcher` class is responsible for routing messages received from the server to the `ControllerDispatcher`, which handles the game logic.
ServerDispatcherInterface
The ServerDispatcherInterface defines the remote methods that can be invoked by the ServerDipatcher
ServerHeartBeater
The `ServerHeartBeater` class implements the `Runnable` interface and represents a thread that periodically sends a "nop" message to the client to maintain the connection with the server.
ServerInterface
Defines how a server is exposed on the network
ServerMessage
The ServerMessage interface represents a message that can be sent from the server to the client.
ServerRmiAdapter
The `ServerRmiAdapter` class is an implementation of the `ClientInterface` and `Closeable` interfaces.
ServerSocketImpl
This class implements the ServerInterface and Runnable interfaces for server-client communication over a socket.
ShapeCommonGoal
ShapeCommonGoal is a class that represents a generic CommonGoal which is satisfied if the BookShelf contains a particular shape of the same tile type.
SimpleMyShelfieAttribute
 
SingleMessageView
Represents a custom component for displaying a single message in the graphical user interface.
SingleMessageViewContainer
Represents a container for a single message view in the graphical user interface.
SingleMessageViewPrivacyType
The `SingleMessageViewPrivacyType` enum represents the privacy types of a single message view in a messaging component.
SingleMessageViewType
The `SingleMessageViewType` enum represents different types of single message views in the message view component of the GUI.
SingleOpponentBookShelfController
 
SocketAccepter
The SocketAccepter class is responsible for accepting incoming client connections on a specified port.
SquarePointPane
The `SquarePointPane` class represents a square point pane, a specialized type of `PointPane` with an equal number of rows and columns.
StairCommonGoal
StairCommonGoal is a class that represents a generic CommonGoal which is satisfied if the BookShelf contains a given number of columns of increasing or decreasing height.
State
State is a class that contains all the references necessary to modify and update the 'state' (hence the name of the class) of the game.
StateChangedNetMessage
Represents a client message indicating a change in the game state.
SuspendedGameManager
The SuspendedGameManager class is responsible for managing the game when it is suspended.
SuspendedGameTimingState
The SuspendedGameTimingState class represents the suspended game state in the timing state machine.
TextColorMyShelfieAttribute
 
TextSizeChangeListener
This class implements a ChangeListener that adjusts the font size of text based on the size of a root pane.
TileBoxChildManager
 
TileSubject
This enum represents each subject that a tile can have depicted on itself
TileSubjectView
Represents a graphical view of a tile subject in the game.
TileSubjectViewState
The `TileSubjectViewState` interface represents the state of a tile subject view in a graphical user interface.
TileType
This class represent the TileType associated with each Tile.
Please refer to Official RuleBook to understand which type of Tile there are in the game.
TileViewInBoard
The `TileViewInBoard` class represents the state of a tile subject view when it is placed on the board in a graphical user interface.
TileViewInBox
The `TileViewInBox` class represents the state of a tile subject view when it is placed in a box in a graphical user interface.
TileViewInOpponent
The `TileViewInOpponent` class represents the state of a tile subject view when it is in an opponent's bookshelf in a graphical user interface.
TimingState
The TimingState class represents an abstract state in the timing state machine.
TimingStateMachine
The TimingStateMachine class manages the timing-related functionality of the game, such as turn durations.
Triple<V,T,E>
A generic class representing a triple of values.
TUI
The `TUI` (Text User Interface) class represents the command-line interface (CLI) of the game.
TupleCommonGoal
TupleCommonGoal is a class that represents a generic CommonGoal which is satisfied if the BookShelf contains a given number of groups of adjacent tiles of the same type on a bookshelf.
UI
The UI abstract class represents the user interface for the game.
ViewData
The ViewData class represents the model, which contains all the datas needed for the view of the game.
WaitingPage
 
WindowSizeChangeListener
This class implements a ChangeListener that maintains the aspect ratio and minimum size of a Stage window.
WinnerChangedNetMessage
Represents a client message indicating a change in the winner of the game.
WinnerPage
The WinnerPage class represents a Page that displays the winner of the game, along with bookshelves and points of all players.
WinningPage
 
WrongChosenTilesFromBoardException
An exception indicating that the chosen tiles from the board are not acceptable.
WrongNumberOfPlayersException
Exception Inicating that there was insert a wrong number of players
